translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the fact that form is empty of an intrinsic nature,🔽and they also apprehend emptiness of an intrinsic nature,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not mentally engaged with the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged with the words ‘inner emptiness’

translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not mentally engaged with the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged with the words ‘outer emptiness’🔽and they apprehend outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid @465a *//

analyzed: dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sgra phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not have the mental activity associated with the knowledge of all aspects, and they pay attention to the words ‘outer and inner emptiness’ as a designation.

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend inner and outer emptiness, and

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sgra chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sgra chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the thought ‘Sounds are empty of all things.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend emptiness of all things,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sgra rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sgra rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the thought ‘Sounds are empty of their own marks.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend emptiness of their own marks,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sgra mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sgra mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the idea that ‘sound is the emptiness of nonapprehension,’🔽and they apprehend the emptiness of nonapprehension,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do; ;de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sgra dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do; ;de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sgra dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the idea that ‘sound is the emptiness of the absence of an existent thing,’

original: byed de / dmigs @466b pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: byed de / dmigs @466b pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they apprehend the emptiness of the absence of an existent thing,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sgra ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sgra ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the statement, ‘Sounds are empty of a basic nature,’🔽and they apprehend emptiness of a basic nature,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do; ;de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sgra dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya🔽bar yid la byed de /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do; ;de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sgra dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the statement, ‘Sounds are empty of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature,’🔽and they apprehend emptiness of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not mentally engaged with the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged with ‘the internal and external emptiness’🔽and they apprehend internal and external emptiness,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.🔽“Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not mentally engaged with the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged with ‘the emptiness of emptiness’🔽and they apprehend the emptiness of emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.🔽“Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not mentally engaged with the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged with ‘the great emptiness’🔽and they apprehend the great emptiness,🔽and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not mentally engaged with the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged with ‘the ultimate emptiness’🔽and they apprehend the ultimate emptiness,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.🔽“Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not mentally engaged with the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged with ‘the conditioned emptiness’🔽and they apprehend the conditioned emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.🔽“Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not mentally engaged with the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged with ‘the unconditioned emptiness’

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @467a *//
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @467a *//
translated: and they apprehend the unconditioned emptiness,🔽and they are conceited about emptiness.🔽“Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not mentally engaged with the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged with ‘the emptiness of the conditioned and the unconditioned’🔽and they apprehend the emptiness

original: la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When practicing the perfection of wisdom, they do not have the mental activity associated with the knowledge of all aspects, and they pay attention to the internal and external emptiness of smell,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: thinking, ‘The internal and external emptiness is empty.’

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: They also falsely project emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: When practicing the perfection of wisdom, they do not have the mental activity associated with the knowledge of all aspects, and they pay attention to the emptiness of smell, thinking, ‘The emptiness of smell is empty.’

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: They also falsely project emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to feces as empty,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they also apprehend the emptiness of great extent,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to urine as the emptiness of ultimate reality,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they also apprehend the emptiness of ultimate reality,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the idea that ‘smell is empty of conditioned things. ’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang @467b dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang @467b dmigs la /
translated: By way of apprehending something they apprehend the emptiness of conditioned things,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the idea that ‘smell is empty of unconditioned things. ’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: By way of apprehending something they apprehend the emptiness of unconditioned things,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the ‘emptiness of the limitless’ as a signless name.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend the emptiness of the limitless,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the ‘emptiness of no beginning and no end’ as a signless name.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend the emptiness of no beginning and no end,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: And they also apprehend the emptiness that is not a substance,🔽and they are conceited about emptiness.🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the idea that smell is empty of smell, thinking, ‘Smell is empty of smell.’🔽And they also apprehend the emptiness of smell,🔽and they are conceited about emptiness.🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the idea that smell is not empty, thinking, ‘Smell is not empty.’🔽And they also apprehend the emptiness that is not empty,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the idea that smell is not permanent, thinking, ‘Smell is not permanent.’🔽And they also apprehend the emptiness that is not permanent,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid @468a *//
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid @468a *//
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the idea that smell is not happiness, thinking, ‘Smell is not happiness.’🔽And they also apprehend the emptiness that is not happiness,🔽and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: la bya ba med par dri rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: la bya ba med par dri rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the idea that smell is not a self, thinking, ‘Smell is not a self.’🔽And they also apprehend the emptiness that is not a self,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the idea that smell is pure, thinking, ‘Smell is pure.’🔽And they also apprehend the emptiness that is pure,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the idea that all phenomena are empty,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they apprehend all phenomena as empty,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the idea that all phenomena are empty of their own marks,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they apprehend all phenomena as empty of their own marks,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the idea that smell is the emptiness of nonapprehension,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they apprehend the emptiness of nonapprehension,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the idea that smell is the emptiness of a nonexistent thing,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po @468b med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po @468b med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they apprehend the emptiness of a nonexistent thing,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ro mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

translated: Because of being attached to the emptiness of all phenomena, they are attached to the emptiness of own-marks.🔽Because of being attached to the emptiness of own-marks, they are attached to the emptiness of other-marks.🔽Because of being attached to the emptiness of other-marks, they are attached to the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽Because of being attached to the emptiness of all phenomena, they are attached to the emptiness of own-marks.🔽Because of being attached to the emptiness of own-marks, they are attached to the emptiness of other-marks.🔽Because of being attached to the emptiness of other-marks, they are attached to the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽Because of being attached to the emptiness of all phenomena, they are attached to the emptiness of the beginningless and endless.🔽Because of being attached to the emptiness of the beginningless and endless, they are attached to the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they become conceited because of emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ro mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ro mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not have the mental activity associated with the knowledge of all aspects, and they pay attention to the emptiness of nonapprehension in the manner of apprehending something.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend the emptiness of nonapprehension,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they become conceited because of emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid @470b la bya ba med par ro dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not have the mental activity associated with the knowledge of all aspects, and they pay attention to the emptiness of things not being apprehended in the manner of apprehending something.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend the emptiness of things not being apprehended,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they become conceited because of emptiness.

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ro ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not have the mental activity associated with the knowledge of all aspects, and they pay attention to the emptiness of essential nature, thinking, ‘This is emptiness.’🔽They pay attention to the emptiness of essential nature by way of apprehending something.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: They also falsely project emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ro dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not have the mental activity associated with the knowledge of all aspects, and they pay attention to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, thinking, ‘This is the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: They also falsely project emptiness.

analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par reg nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not endowed with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to ‘inner emptiness’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and, perceiving inner emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do; ;de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par reg don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities as ‘the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: Because of apprehending, they apprehend the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they become conceited because of emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chos ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chos ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the emptiness of non-apprehension, thinking, ‘A dharma is empty of non-apprehension.’🔽They pay attention to the emptiness of non-apprehension by way of apprehending it,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they falsely project ‘emptiness.’🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the emptiness of what is beyond limits, thinking, ‘A dharma is empty of what is beyond limits.’🔽They pay attention to the emptiness of what is beyond limits by way of apprehending it,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they falsely project ‘emptiness.’🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the emptiness of all dharmas, thinking, ‘A dharma is empty of all dharmas.’🔽They pay attention to the emptiness of all dharmas by way of apprehending it,🔽and they falsely project ‘emptiness.’🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the emptiness of its own mark, thinking, ‘A dharma is empty of its own mark.’

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pas nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

translated: They pay attention to the emptiness of its own mark by way of apprehending it,🔽and they falsely project ‘emptiness.’🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the emptiness of non-existence, thinking, ‘A dharma is empty of non-existence.’🔽They pay attention to the emptiness of non-existence by way of apprehending it,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they falsely project ‘emptiness.’🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the emptiness of own-being, thinking, ‘A dharma is empty of own-being.’🔽They pay attention to the emptiness of own-being by way of apprehending it,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they falsely project ‘emptiness.’🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar
translated: Furthermore, Subhuti, when the Bodhisattva, the great being, courses in the perfection of wisdom, he does not, without having taken hold of the thought of the knowledge of all modes, review the eye-consciousness as the inner emptiness,🔽

original: yid la byed de /
analyzed: yid la byed de /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not mentally engaged with the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged with the thought, ‘Eye consciousness is empty of the inner.’🔽They apprehend inner emptiness

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the fact that eye consciousness is empty of the extreme of nonrejection,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they also apprehend emptiness of the extreme of nonrejection,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //🔽de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid @476a *//
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid @476a *//
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: la bya ba med par mig gi rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: la bya ba med par mig gi rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the fact that eye consciousness is empty of no beginning and no end,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they also apprehend emptiness of no beginning and no end,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi rnam par shes pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi rnam par shes pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the fact that visual consciousness is not stopped, thinking, ‘It is empty.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: And they also apprehend the emptiness that is not stopped,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the fact that visual consciousness is empty of a basic nature, thinking, ‘It is empty.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: And they also apprehend the emptiness that is a basic nature,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the thought ‘The eye consciousness is empty of all phenomena,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they apprehend emptiness of all phenomena,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the thought ‘The eye consciousness is empty of an intrinsic nature,’🔽and they apprehend emptiness of an intrinsic nature,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the fact that eye consciousness is the emptiness of the insubstantiality of the nonexistence of things,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the fact that the nose consciousness is not apprehended, thinking ‘It is empty of not being apprehended.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: And they apprehend emptiness as not being apprehended,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are proud because of emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the fact that the nose consciousness is empty of being nothing at all,🔽and they apprehend emptiness as being nothing at all,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are proud because of emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: and they apprehend that emptiness of an essential nature that is not nonexistent,🔽and they are conceited about emptiness.🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the fact that the nose consciousness is empty of an essential nature that is not an essential nature,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they apprehend that emptiness of an essential nature that is not an essential nature,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the fact that the nose consciousness is empty of an essential nature that is not something that can be indicated,🔽and they apprehend that emptiness of an essential nature that is not something that can be indicated,🔽and they are conceited about emptiness.🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the fact that the nose consciousness is empty of an essential nature that is not something that cannot be indicated,

original: de shes rab kyi @481b pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de;
analyzed: de shes rab kyi @481b pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de;
translated: and they apprehend that emptiness of an essential nature that is not something that cannot be indicated,🔽and they are conceited about emptiness.🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the fact that the nose consciousness is empty of an essential nature that is not something that is not something that can be indicated,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they apprehend that emptiness of an essential nature that is not something that is not something that can be indicated,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid🔽la byed de /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not mentally engaged with the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged with the thought, ‘The tongue consciousness is inner emptiness.’

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: They are mentally engaged with the thought, ‘Inner emptiness is empty of inner emptiness,’🔽and they are mentally engaged with the thought, ‘That emptiness is the tongue consciousness.’

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they are mentally engaged with the thought, ‘The tongue consciousness is outer emptiness.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la; stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la; stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: They are mentally engaged with the thought, ‘Outer emptiness is empty of outer emptiness,’🔽and they are mentally engaged with the thought, ‘That emptiness is the tongue consciousness.’

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the fact that the tongue consciousness is ‘empty of an outside and an inside,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they apprehend an ‘inside and outside emptiness’ because of apprehending it in a way that takes it as a basis.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //🔽de shes rab kyi @482a *//
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do // de shes rab kyi @482a *//
translated: They also falsely project ‘emptiness.’

original: pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the fact that the tongue consciousness is ‘the emptiness of emptiness,’🔽and they apprehend an ‘emptiness of emptiness’ because of apprehending it in a way that takes it as a basis.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: They also falsely project ‘emptiness.’

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the thought ‘the consciousness of the tongue is wishless’,🔽but they apprehend the wishless and are conceited about the wishless.🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the thought ‘the consciousness of the tongue is without foundation’,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: but they apprehend the absence of foundation and are conceited about the absence of foundation.🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the thought ‘the consciousness of the tongue is isolated’,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: but they apprehend isolation and are conceited about isolation.🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the thought ‘the consciousness of the tongue is calm’,🔽but they apprehend calm and are conceited about calm.🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the thought ‘the consciousness of the tongue is void’,🔽but they apprehend voidness and are conceited about voidness.🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the thought ‘the consciousness of the tongue is not produced’,🔽but they apprehend nonproduction and are conceited about nonproduction.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the thought ‘the consciousness of the tongue is not stopped’,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la; stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la; stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: but they apprehend nonstopping and are conceited about nonstopping.🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the thought ‘the consciousness of the tongue is not something to be renounced’,🔽but they apprehend nonrenunciation and are conceited about nonrenunciation.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the idea that ‘the consciousness of the tongue is empty of conditioned things. ’

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su @482b byed do //

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they also falsely project emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the fact that the tongue consciousness is empty of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: And because of that they also apprehend the emptiness of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they also falsely project emptiness.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus kyi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar🔽yid la byed de /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not mentally engaged with the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged with the consciousness of the body as ‘inner emptiness.’🔽They apprehend inner emptiness

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

translated: And they are conceited about emptiness.

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without paying attention to the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the consciousness of the body as ‘the emptiness of ultimate reality.’🔽Because of their attention to the emptiness of ultimate reality, they also apprehend emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

translated: And they are conceited about emptiness.

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do; ;de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: “When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without dedicating attention to the knowledge of all aspects, they attend to the emptiness of the limitless as the sensory contact of the nose.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They attend to the emptiness of the limitless as the sensory contact of the nose in the manner of apprehending something.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: They falsely project even emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis @494a *//
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis @494a *//
translated: “When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without dedicating attention to the knowledge of all aspects, they attend to the emptiness of no beginning and no end as the sensory contact of the nose.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They attend to the emptiness of no beginning and no end as the sensory contact of the nose in the manner of apprehending something.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and that emptiness would not be a non-phenomenon.🔽Mañjuśrī, if the emptiness of phenomena were phenomena,🔽that emptiness would not be empty,🔽and that emptiness would not be a non-phenomenon.🔽Mañjuśrī, the emptiness of the nose is not the nose,🔽and the emptiness of phenomena is not phenomena.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: Mañjuśrī, the emptiness of the nose is not the nose,🔽and the emptiness of phenomena is not phenomena.🔽Mañjuśrī, the emptiness of the nose is not the nose,🔽and the emptiness of phenomena is not phenomena.🔽Mañjuśrī, the emptiness of the nose is not the nose,🔽and the emptiness of phenomena is not phenomena.🔽Mañjuśrī, the emptiness of the nose is not the nose,🔽and the emptiness of phenomena is not phenomena.🔽Mañjuśrī, the emptiness of the nose is not the nose,

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and the emptiness of phenomena is not phenomena.🔽Mañjuśrī, the emptiness of the nose is not the nose,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and the emptiness of phenomena is not phenomena.🔽Mañjuśrī, the emptiness of the nose is not the nose,🔽and the emptiness of phenomena is not phenomena.🔽Mañjuśrī, the emptiness of the nose is not the nose,🔽and the emptiness of phenomena is not phenomena.🔽Mañjuśrī, the emptiness of the nose is not the nose,

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

translated: and the emptiness of phenomena is not phenomena.🔽Mañjuśrī, the emptiness of the nose is not the nose,🔽and the emptiness of phenomena is not phenomena.🔽Mañjuśrī, the emptiness of the nose is not the nose,🔽and the emptiness of phenomena is not phenomena.🔽Mañjuśrī, the emptiness of the nose is not the nose,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and the emptiness of phenomena

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the totality of the sensory domain of nose contact as empty of all dharmas,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they apprehend that emptiness of all dharmas,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the totality of the sensory domain of nose contact as empty of an intrinsic nature,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis @494b rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis @494b rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they apprehend that emptiness of an intrinsic nature,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the non-apprehension of nose contact as ‘empty of non-apprehension.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: Because of being attached to the idea of non-apprehension, they are attached to the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: And they are proud because of emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the non-apprehension of nose contact as ‘empty of the absence of an existent thing.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: Because of being attached to the idea of the absence of an existent thing, they are attached to the emptiness of the absence of an existent thing.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: And they are proud because of emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not mentally engaged with the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged with the emptiness of the inner with regard to the contact that is the coming together of tongue and taste.

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the fact that ‘the composite of tongue contact is the emptiness of nonapprehension,’🔽and they apprehend the emptiness of nonapprehension,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med @497a *//🔽pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the emptiness of own-being of tongue contact,

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the emptiness of the nonexistence of own-being of tongue contact,

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do ////
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do ////

original: bam po lnga bcu pa /

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar🔽yid la byed de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they attend to the contact of the body as ‘empty of an inner self,’🔽attending to it as an objective mental construct.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend inner emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod @497b pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod @497b pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they attend to the contact of the body as ‘empty of an outer self,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: attending to it as an objective mental construct.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: They become mentally engaged in the emptiness of emptiness, but they are mentally engaged in a way that is based on apprehending something.🔽They become mentally engaged in the emptiness of great extent, but they are mentally engaged in a way that is based on apprehending something.🔽They become mentally engaged in the emptiness of ultimate reality, but they are mentally engaged in a way that is based on apprehending something.🔽They become mentally engaged in the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, but they are mentally engaged in a way that is based on apprehending something.🔽They become mentally engaged in the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, but they are mentally engaged in a way that is based on apprehending something.🔽They become mentally engaged in the emptiness of the unlimited, but they are mentally engaged in a way that is based on apprehending something.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: They become mentally engaged in the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, but they are mentally engaged in a way that is based on apprehending something.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They become mentally engaged in the emptiness of inherent existence, but they are mentally engaged in a way that is based on apprehending something.🔽They become mentally engaged in the emptiness of all things, but they are mentally engaged in a way that is based on apprehending something.🔽They become mentally engaged in the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, but they are mentally engaged in a way that is based on apprehending something.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do; ;de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do; ;de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes
translated: They become mentally engaged in the emptiness of non-apprehension, but they are mentally engaged in a way that is based on apprehending something.

original: bya bar yid la byed de; dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /🔽stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: bya bar yid la byed de; dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /🔽stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: They become mentally engaged in the emptiness of the absence of an existent thing, but they are mentally engaged in a way that is based on apprehending something.🔽They become mentally engaged in the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, but they are mentally engaged in a way that is based on apprehending something.🔽They become mentally engaged in the emptiness of the essential nature of own characteristics, but they are mentally engaged in a way that is based on apprehending something.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the great emptiness of the composite of physical contact as ‘the great emptiness of the composite of physical contact.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: Because of being taken as a basis, they also take great emptiness to be a basis,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //🔽de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par @498a *//
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par @498a *//
translated: and they become conceited because of emptiness.

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to mental contact as ‘empty of an intrinsic nature,’

translated: and they apprehend emptiness of an intrinsic nature, and they falsely project emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
