translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to mental contact as ‘empty of the absence of an existent thing,’

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they apprehend emptiness of the absence of an existent thing,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa @501b zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa @501b zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the emptiness of own-being of mental contact, thinking, ‘Mental contact is empty of mental contact.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they become conceited because of emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the emptiness of the nonexistence of own-being of mental contact, thinking, ‘Mental contact is empty of the nonexistence of own-being.’

original: / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: Because of being taken as a basis, the emptiness of the nonexistence of own-being is apprehended,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they become conceited because of emptiness.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong🔽pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not paying attention to the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact as ‘inner emptiness.’🔽They apprehend inner emptiness

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

translated: When they are practicing the perfection of wisdom, they are not paying attention to the knowledge of all aspects, and they pay attention to the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact as ‘outer emptiness.’🔽They apprehend outer emptiness

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong @502a *//🔽pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong @502a *// pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the condition as the meeting of the six sense fields as being empty of an inner and outer.

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: By way of apprehending something they also apprehend inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they become conceited with that emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de;
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de;
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the condition as the meeting of the six sense fields as being the emptiness of emptiness,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: by way of apprehending something they also apprehend the emptiness of emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they become conceited with that emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the condition as the meeting of the six sense fields as great emptiness.

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend great emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the condition as the meeting of the six sense fields as the emptiness of ultimate reality.

analyzed: / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend the emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽and they are conceited about the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do; ;de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus byas🔽@502b stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

translated: “When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without dedicating attention to the knowledge of all aspects, they attend to the condition as the meeting and joining of the eye and form as conditioned🔽and as empty.

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They attend to conditioned emptiness as something that can be apprehended,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they falsely project even emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de

translated: “When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without dedicating attention to the knowledge of all aspects, they attend to the condition as the meeting and joining of the eye and form as unconditioned

analyzed: / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
translated: “When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without dedicating the attention associated with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the idea that the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the union of eye, form, and consciousness is empty of the unlimited.

analyzed: de / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la; stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: They apprehend the emptiness of the unlimited, and they become mentally absorbed in emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar🔽yid la byed de /

translated: “When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without dedicating the attention associated with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the idea that the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the union of eye, form, and consciousness is empty of no beginning and no end.

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dor @503a *//

analyzed: ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: They become conceited because of emptiness.🔽“When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without dedicating the wholesome roots to the śrāvaka level or pratyekabuddha level, they attend to the condition as mental contact in the desire realm as impermanent, and they attend to the condition as mental contact in the form realm and the formless realm as impermanent.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

translated: They attend to the condition as mental contact in the desire realm as suffering, and they attend to the condition as mental contact in the form realm and the formless realm as suffering.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: They attend to the condition as mental contact in the desire realm as selfless, and they attend to the condition as mental contact in the form realm and the formless realm as selfless.🔽They attend to the condition as mental contact in the desire realm as impure, and they attend to the condition as mental contact in the form realm and the formless realm as impure.🔽They attend to the condition as mental contact in the desire realm as having nothing to do with the world, and they attend to the condition as mental contact in the form realm and the formless realm as having nothing to do with the world.🔽They attend to the condition as mental contact in the desire realm as having nothing to do with the past, future, and present, and they attend to the condition as mental contact in the form realm and the formless realm as having nothing to do with the past, future, and present.🔽They attend to the condition as mental contact in the desire realm as having nothing to do with the three times, and they attend to the condition as mental contact in the form realm and the formless realm as having nothing to do with the three times.🔽They attend to the condition as mental contact in the desire realm as having nothing to do with the world, and they attend to the condition as mental contact in the form realm and the formless realm as having nothing to do with the world.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de🔽/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

translated: They attend to the condition as mental contact in the desire realm as having nothing to do with the past, future, and present, and they attend to the condition as mental contact in the form realm and the formless realm as having nothing to do with the past, future, and present.🔽They attend to the condition as mental contact in the desire realm as having nothing to do with the three times, and they attend to the condition as mental contact in the form realm and the formless realm as having nothing to do with the three times.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: They become conceited because of emptiness.

translated: They become mentally engaged in the emptiness of emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

translated: “When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without dedicating the wholesome roots to the śrāvaka level or pratyekabuddha level, they bring beings to maturity and purify their own buddhafield, and they will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽“When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without dedicating the wholesome roots to the śrāvaka level or pratyekabuddha level, they bring beings to maturity and purify their own buddhafield, and they will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽“When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without dedicating the wholesome roots to the śrāvaka level or pratyekabuddha level, they bring beings to maturity and purify their own buddhafield, and they will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽“When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without dedicating the wholesome roots to the śrāvaka level or pratyekabuddha level, they bring beings to maturity and purify their own buddhafield, and they will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: “When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without dedicating the wholesome roots to the śrāvaka level or pratyekabuddha level, they bring beings to maturity and purify their own buddhafield, and they will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the earth element as ‘non-rejectable emptiness.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend non-rejectable emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the earth element as ‘empty of a basic nature.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend emptiness of a basic nature,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the earth element as empty of all phenomena.

original: dmigs pa'i @516b tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i @516b tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: By way of apprehending something, they apprehend the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they become conceited because of emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the earth element as empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: By way of apprehending something, they apprehend the emptiness of an intrinsic nature,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they become conceited because of emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the earth element as ‘unapprehendable emptiness,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they apprehend the emptiness of nonapprehension,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the earth element as ‘the emptiness of things that have no real basis,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the earth element as empty of an intrinsic nature,

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do // de shes rab kyi pha @517a *//
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

analyzed: rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de; dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the earth element as the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature,

translated: and they apprehend that emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not mentally engaged with the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged with the water element as ‘empty of an inner nature.’

translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not mentally engaged with the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged with the water element as ‘empty of an outer nature.’🔽They apprehend outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chu'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de; dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects they are mentally engaged in the element of water as uncompounded emptiness,🔽and they also apprehend uncompounded emptiness,

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chu'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chu'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the element of water as ‘infinitely empty.’🔽Because of being fixated on emptiness, they are fixated on the emptiness of what is infinite.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: Because of being fixated on the emptiness of what is infinite, they are fixated on the emptiness of what is infinite as an entity.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chu'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the element of water as ‘empty of no beginning and no end.’

translated: Because of being fixated on emptiness, they are fixated on the emptiness of no beginning and no end.🔽Because of being fixated on the emptiness of no beginning and no end, they are fixated on the emptiness of no beginning and no end as an entity.

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the element of consciousness as ‘the emptiness of all phenomena.

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the element of consciousness as ‘the emptiness of the intrinsic nature.🔽They pay attention to the emptiness of the intrinsic nature by way of apprehending it,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do; ;de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya🔽bar yid la byed de /

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the fact that the consciousness element is not apprehended, thinking, ‘The consciousness element is the emptiness of not being apprehended.’

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

translated: and they falsely project even emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the fact that the consciousness element is the emptiness of the nonexistence of things, thinking, ‘The consciousness element is the emptiness of the nonexistence of things.’

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ma rig pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not endowed with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to ignorance as ‘inner emptiness.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

translated: and they falsely project emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they pay attention to the emptiness of the ultimate, but not with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects.🔽They pay attention to the emptiness of the ultimate in an apprehending manner,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they falsely project emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to consciousness as ‘unabandoned emptiness,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they also apprehend ‘unabandoned emptiness,’

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de; dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de; dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to consciousness as ‘emptiness of a basic nature,’

original: pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they also apprehend ‘emptiness of a basic nature,’

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to consciousness as ‘empty of all phenomena.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: Because of their attention to it, they also apprehend emptiness as all phenomena.

original: @533a *// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: @533a *// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: And they become conceited because of emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to consciousness as ‘empty of its own mark.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: Because of their attention to it, they also apprehend emptiness as the own-mark of consciousness.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: And they become conceited because of emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to consciousness, thinking ‘It is the emptiness of non-apprehension.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: Because of being attached to the idea of an ‘I’ and the idea of a ‘mine,’ they pay attention to the emptiness of non-apprehension,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they falsely project ‘emptiness.’

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to consciousness, thinking ‘It is the emptiness of the nonexistence of things.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: Because of being attached to the idea of an ‘I’ and the idea of a ‘mine,’ they pay attention to the emptiness of the nonexistence of things,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they falsely project ‘emptiness.’

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to consciousness as empty of an intrinsic nature,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they apprehend emptiness of an intrinsic nature,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @533b pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @533b pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to consciousness as empty of the essential nature of nonexistence,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not mentally engaged with the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged with ‘name and form inner emptiness.’

original: de / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: de / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend inner emptiness

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not mentally engaged with the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged with ‘name and form outer emptiness.’🔽They apprehend outer emptiness

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the internal and external emptiness of name and form, thinking, ‘Name and form are empty of name and form.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: Because of that, they also apprehend the emptiness of the internal and the emptiness of the external,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par @534a *// ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the emptiness of great name-and-form.

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the emptiness of ultimate name-and-form.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend the emptiness of the ultimate,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without paying attention to the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the fact that ‘name and form are empty of being made,’

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @534b nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs pa /
